Depth Projector

A driver module to set default gpio states
for Depth SWDIO and SWDCLK.

Required properties:
- compatible: must be "oculus,projector"
- pinctrl-names: default
- pinctrl-0: gpio pin control configuration

Example:

&tlmm {
  depth_swd_default_0: depth_swdio_default@0 {
    pins = "gpio152", "gpio153";
    function = "gpio";
    input-enable;
  };
};

&vendor {
  projector: oculus,projector {
      compatible = "oculus,projector";
      pinctrl-names = "default";
      pinctrl-0 = <&depth_swd_default_0>;
  };
};
